name: Dark Park
description:
Make sure to download the latest version!

This is a horror game made for Mashup Game jam 2022, but I started super late so I had to make this in a little over 12 hours

You are sent to an abandoned theme park to find a lost key, but you aren't alone.

I made the models, textures, and sounds. I wasn't sure what the submission counted for, sorry.

Idea from the generator is:

Genre: Horror

Theme: Sound

Setting: Theme Park

Item: Camera
